website_summaries.verdict: The dial on this model helps you check base timing quickly and is good for those less experienced with adjusting their own timing.
pros: Simple, easy to use, and accurate
Bright flash works even in daylight
cons: While this is a reliable model, it does not have the LED readout that some others offer

customer_reviews.title: Steel Inductive Pickup
customer_reviews.text: Description states "Molded inductive pickup clamps over spark plug wire". It's NOT. It is metal. I bought this Actron light to check the timing on my 1930 Ford Model A. The plug 'wires' are copper strips. Since the pickup is metal when it comes in contact with the plug 'wire' it transfers the spark to your HAND. What a rude awakening... My other Actron light with a plastic molded inductive pickup works fine on the Ford Model A. No shock.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy at the Beach

customer_reviews.title: Not for longevity
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased when i first began using it. Then the lead to the pickup started getting stiff like it might become brittle. I've had it a year maybe two, been using to time the same vehicle and never seem to be able to get it dialed in. Also, the last time I used it the bulb apparently burnt out because it quit flashing in the middle of timing an engine and doesn't seem to be replaceable without destroying the rest of the tool, trying to open it up. Needless to say, I'm looking for a different one now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to the my arsenal of automotive tools. This tool is a must on distributor style ignition systems where ignition timing is manually set rather than through the ECU. Easy to use and accurate. Now my car runs smooth throughout the whole RPM range.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Posada

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought one roughly 10 years ago, ruined it by trying to lengthen the cables (don’t do that). Bought a replacement because I’m familiar. Personally, the best non digital no RPM equipped timing light IMO
customer_reviews.author: april jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Fairly made! Not the best of quality! You can tell it’s China made
customer_reviews.text: Kinda feels cheaply made! It worked ok! My biggest complaint is that you have to hold the power button down to make the light strobe. Should have been able to just turn on and it’s on not have to hold the button on the back down.
customer_reviews.author: GARY H.

customer_reviews.title: Good value light for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good value light for the money. As others have said probably best for home use rather than a commercial garage but the ability to set the timing degrees on the gun itself is helpful as it moved the marks to a more visible part of the crank pulley.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola Austerfield

customer_reviews.title: but so far it worked fine & glad to have the "timing advance" feature that ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it a couple times, but so far it worked fine & glad to have the "timing advance" feature that I had in the past, but my last timing light didn't have it & I missed it. Comes in handy on cars with vacuum advance on distributor. I have been in auto repair business for 50 years & missed not having the advance feature on my last timing light.
customer_reviews.author: Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with MSD 6A box. Wtf
customer_reviews.text: They don't tell u that it doesn't work with any aftermarket ignitions. Lame. And I'm trying to return. They better refund me
customer_reviews.author: caligrown8

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: This light worked great to time my 1976 BMW 2002. I set the knob to the degree of advance I need and ensure that the engine is zeroed in. Very easy to use, very accurate, and looks like it should last a long time. I used a standard car battery to power this with zero issues. It is a bit big, and I had a bit of a hard time fitting it to where I needed it to go. Eventually I found a position that would work well, might be easier with two people.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This timing gun is the biggest piece of crap I've ever bought, if you set it, then take it off the motor and try again it's different. DON'T BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jon s.

customer_reviews.title: Only a coulpe uses over 2 months, its a dud
customer_reviews.text: Worked well a couple times, Now its done. Either no pick up signal or no bulb. I expect more than that for $54. Last Actron for me
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price.....
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product, it met my expectations and does what it was made for. Also, you can't beat the price. I got a great product for a good price, and when you consider the free shipping, its a "win-win" situation....
customer_reviews.author: Ray Carvalho

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should, the light is bright enough for day and night usage. It is made out of plastic, don't drop it as it is likely going to brake if you do. The cables are not weak but are not strong either, it is heat resistant. It is good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo J. Alfaro F.

customer_reviews.title: Timing Light Actron CP7528
customer_reviews.text: Works well!! Easy as pie to hook up and use. Nice and bright. It is so light you might assume it is fragile and perhaps I was lucky but a drop to the cement floor didn't hurt it. It slid off the seat of the motorcycle, so about 30" drop to the floor after bouncing off the kick stand. Still works and doesn't rattle or make new noises.
customer_reviews.author: Desert DogTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The Actron CP7528 Advance Timing Light is an excellent and well-made tool. The focused zenon bulb permits easy visual observation of timing and advance marks when used in high ambient light conditions. I replaced a vintage Sun timing light and enjoy the lighter weight of the Actron unit. A great value for an economically priced, quality tool.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Timing advance function failed after 2 months/4 uses (and 3 weeks outside my 'return window'). Junk
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Rich

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Worked well the only time i've used it so far.
customer_reviews.author: John Juan

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Used it five times, then it quit working. Died completely! I see that my return window has closed on this item. What a waste of money! I do not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Bern

customer_reviews.title: The one I got is a lemon!
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this to dial in the timing on my bike. It worked the first few times I used it but now the moment I come off idle it quits working
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F.

customer_reviews.title: Replacing one I had for 10 years. if I ...
customer_reviews.text: Replacing one I had for 10 years. if I hadn't run over the first one, it would still be going strong...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value and services.
customer_reviews.text: This timing light performed as expected, a very reasonable price. Would not hesitate to recommend this timing light to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Inspect and make sure it works
customer_reviews.text: Went to use it for the first time......AND.....it was junk. Did not work at all. Threw it in the trash....
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Husband gift
customer_reviews.text: He loves it and uses it often. Was a great gift, one that he picked himself. Another boy toy tool to add to his collection.
customer_reviews.author: MARCIA S.

customer_reviews.title: The pickup is better when you are working around headers
customer_reviews.text: The unit works very well. The pickup is better when you are working around headers, it will not melt like a plastic pickup will if it slides.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good timing light for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good timing light for the price. Dial is a little small so you're not going to get 1 degree accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: ccarl03

customer_reviews.title: This light works just fine
customer_reviews.text: Some other reviews complain that the light isn't very bright. It's adequate for the garage or under the hood as long as you are not in bright sun. If you want a super bright Zenon flash, go ahead and pay triple the price. I will just shade the harmonic balancer and use white chalk.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Workd great
customer_reviews.text: Works great! light is bright the only thing is it doesnt come in a case just the plastic its shipped in.
customer_reviews.author: MADMIKE

customer_reviews.title: Good light with only one complaint
customer_reviews.text: When I got the light the adjustment knob fell off. I had to relocate the knob and tighten the set screws to get it back to functional. I've only used it once since then but it worked as expected and was visible in day light.
customer_reviews.author: mypointofview

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with this timing light. It works very well and is user friendly.. I would highly recommend it for any car project.
customer_reviews.author: sandra45

customer_reviews.title: ... I needed to keep my old chevy truck running great. thank
customer_reviews.text: this timing light is just what I needed to keep my old chevy truck running great. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Melody Barrett

customer_reviews.title: I really like that it is light weight
customer_reviews.text: I really like that it is light weight. Nice bright beam even in sunlight. The long cord helps keep from getting caught in the fan. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Schmo!

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Seemd to work fine with no real issues. Only used once so far though so I cannot attest to the long term viability of this device.
customer_reviews.author: Steve T

customer_reviews.title: On Time
customer_reviews.text: Product works great and it bright enough to use in full sun. I would recommend this to any car guy needing old school timing on a hotrod.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia S.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Well, it works just like my old timing light did. I like the fact that it has a metal probe. This is what killed my old light, it melted the pickup against the exhaust. But the body of the tool itself is plastic. I imagine almost everything you would buy these days would be plastic. I am just old school I guess. I would prefer a metal tool. But I know it would cost more.
customer_reviews.author: Lanny A. Netz

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should, but the paint is already ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should, but the paint is already beginning to chip a bit. Not a huge deal, just the reason for 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Simonsen Jr.

customer_reviews.title: very light and easy to operate.
customer_reviews.text: works great, nice and bright, easy to hook up power cables, very detailed and easy to read instructions. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E. Grizzle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This timing light is being used in a 6 volt + ground application and works great. It is well constructed, the lead wires are long enough to stay out of the way of moving parts, and the light is very bright. You can see your timing marks in the sunlight!
customer_reviews.author: Frank S. Czap

customer_reviews.title: ... I bought this to replace not one but two bad timing lights I had bought at Sears
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this to replace not one but two bad timing lights I had bought at Sears. Surely I thought this one would be better since it had some good reviews. I used it once about a year ago and then tried to use it again this weekend. It was as dead as a hammer. That was $54 down the drain. Another disposable item from China no doubt. Don't bother, just buy something better, if you can find something made here.
customer_reviews.author: bryan lee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Light and advance offset adjustment
customer_reviews.text: This light is bright and the offset dial is clearly labeled. Works well even outside. Does the job for the pro and the starter.
customer_reviews.author: Darlin

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Can't beat the price. Works as it should. What else do you need to know. Bought to tune my scooter and was not disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Plastic and Poor Construction
customer_reviews.text: Lasted for one. It was an easy return as it went from box to use to broke in less then 10 minutes. Spend more and get a better quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Baughan

customer_reviews.title: Light is Not Bright Enough For Use in Broad Daylight
customer_reviews.text: I was checking the timing on my vehicle and was so disappointed that I could not see the timing mark in the daylight when checking the timing on my '89 Mustang GT. I cannot recommend this timing light, because I used to check timing on my dad's vehicles years ago, and never had an issue with the timing light being bright enough like I do with this one.
customer_reviews.author: John Sabo

product_meta.title: Actron CP7528 Advance Timing Light, Gray
product_meta.description: This timing light is a strobe light used for checking ignition timing and fires whenever the spark plug does to maximize engine efficiency. Some older timing lights require the removal of the spark plug boot in order to attach a direct pickup between the wire's terminal and the center conductor of the spark plug. It includes comprehensive user manual with illustrated step-by-step automotive test procedures and has 1 year warranty.
feature_bullets: Heat resistant over molding on battery clips with one touch control
Linear xenon flash tube and focused fresnel lens provides light bright enough for use in broad daylight
Molded inductive pickup clamps over spark plug wire make hook-up easy
Advance timing light allows accurate adjustment of base and advance timing reading

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars91 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
